snippet: More than 1,700 asylum seekers from Myanmar’s Rohingya minority who arrived in Thailand by boat early this year are being held in crowded prisons.
abstract: Thirty Muslim Rohingya asylum seekers from Myanmar detained in southern Thailand for illegally entering country escape from jail cell, 10 days after they were moved from crowded detention center; more than 1,700 asylum seekers from Myanmar’s Rohingya minority who arrived in Thailand by boat early in 2013 are being held in crowded prisons.
lead_paragraph: More than 1,700 asylum seekers from Myanmar’s Rohingya minority who arrived in Thailand by boat early this year are being held in crowded prisons.

headline.main: Thailand: 30 Asylum Seekers Escape From Jail
headline.print_headline: Thailand: 30 Asylum Seekers Escape From Detention Camp
